feed.title: Blog of ltlnx
feed.subtitle: All pages on the blog of ltlnx

entry.title: example post
entry.summary: This post is an example post. If the post is in the "sticky" folder, it won't have a date in the URL, and would be directly put in the base directory instead. Useful for non-post material like about pages.
